casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Mark Edwin JONES No. 207P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Mark L. Hayes, Attorney at Law, For Jones, Mark Edwin Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina Melody R. Hairston, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina Ashley Welch, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of June 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
